headline: Stocks to Watch Monday: Apple, Nvidia, Broadcom, Shopify
summary: ↗️ Amazon (AMZN); Apple (AAPL); Meta (META); Tesla (TSLA): The biggest U.S. tech stocks surged Monday after the White House and China agreed to hefty tariff cuts. Amazon sells many Chinese-made products on its platform; China is an important market for Tesla; and Apple does much of its assembly in the country.
